name: Satanic
description: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

abilities.name: Lifesteal
abilities.description: The wielder's attacks steal their target's life, healing the wielder for a portion of physical attack damage dealt.
notes: Only works with physical attack damage, does not work with magical or pure attack damage
Does not work with physical or any other spell damage
Does not work with instant attacks that do not trigger attack modifier
Stacks additively with other lifesteal sources
Treats illusions and creep-heroes as heroes
Does not work on allied units, buildings, ward-type units, or couriers
Lifesteal is less effective when attacking creeps

abilities.name: Unholy Rage
abilities.description: Applies a basic dispel on the caster and greatly increases the lifesteal value for a short duration.
notes: Interrupts the caster's channeling abilities upon cast
Applies a basic dispel on the user upon cast
Lifesteal is less effective when attacking creeps

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant 550 health and 2.5 health regeneration
Grants 25 main attack damage to strength heroes
Grants 11.25 main attack damage to universal heroes
Can only be completed with items from the Secret Shop
